page.title: 01MARLEY HILL/CAUSEY,GATESHEAD
page.content: Our area of study is geographically situated to the west of the{TEAM {VALLEY TRADING ESTATE}in the COUNTY of {TYNE and WEAR.}This predominantly rural area, consists mainly of small isolated farms and several areas of woodland.The main Sunniside to Stanley road, the{A6076}runs through the area. The area supports a link with the past days of steam through the running of the old Sunniside to Tanfield Railway, kept alive by enthusiasts, during the summer months.Included in the area is the famous{CAUSEY ARCH}the oldest railway viaduct in the world. It is a sparsely populated area with ample opportunity to take advantage of leisure pursuits,including rock climbing, discovering the origins of our present day railway system,and walking along the many foot and bridle paths.
